guide.name: guide
guide.description: Link to a guide from the Bapharia website.

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the guide from Bapharia.com

time.name: time
time.description: Get current time, or convert a JST time to your local time zone.

options.name: time
options.description: The JST time to convert to local time, in HH:mm format. Defaults to start of the day in Japan.

options.name: date
options.description: The date to add into the conversion, in yyyy-MM-dd format. Defaults to the current date in Japan.

raids.name: raids
raids.description: Displays the Raid & Defensive Battle schedule, adjusted for your local time zone.

liquidmemories.name: liquidmemories
liquidmemories.description: Information about the available Liquid Memories.

options.name: color
options.description: Information about a specific liquid memory.
